CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "accounts" (
    "account_id" BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "username" VARCHAR(255),
    "account_name" VARCHAR(255),
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "chats" (
    "chat_id" BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "chat_name" VARCHAR(255),
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "companies" (
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "company_name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "description" TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "account_company_relations" (
    "account_company_relation_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "account_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "accounts" ("account_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "bots" (
    "bot_id" BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "bot_token" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "secret_token" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "bot_username" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "bot_first_name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "is_active" BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT False,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "bot_chat_relations" (
    "bot_chat_relation_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "is_admin" BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT False,
    "bot_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "bots" ("bot_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "chat_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "chats" ("chat_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "messages" (
    "message_id" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "timestamp" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    "text" TEXT,
    "s3_key" VARCHAR(255),
    "account_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "accounts" ("account_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "chat_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "chats" ("chat_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "prompts" (
    "prompt_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "prompt_name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "text" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "chat_schedules" (
    "schedule_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "schedule_type" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    "interval_hours" INT,
    "interval_minutes" INT,
    "time_of_day" TIMETZ,
    "cron_expression" VARCHAR(100),
    "run_at" TIMESTAMPTZ,
    "enabled" BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT True,
    "last_run_at" TIMESTAMPTZ,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    "time_to_send" BIGINT NOT NULL,
    "chat_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "chats" ("chat_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "prompt_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "prompts" ("prompt_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "analysis_results" (
    "analysis_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "result_text" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    "date_from" BIGINT,
    "date_to" BIGINT,
    "tokens_input" INT NOT NULL,
    "tokens_output" INT NOT NULL,
    "send_time" BIGINT NOT NULL,
    "chat_id" BIGINT REFERENCES "chats" ("chat_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "prompt_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "prompts" ("prompt_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "schedule_id" UUID REFERENCES "chat_schedules" ("schedule_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "target_chats" (
    "target_chat_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "chat_id" BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES "chats" ("chat_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "schedule_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "chat_schedules" ("schedule_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "user_roles" (
    "role_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "role_name" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "permissions" (
    "permission_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "role_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "user_roles" ("role_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "users" (
    "user_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "username" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    "password_hash" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "user_company_relations" (
    "user_company_relation_id" UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "company_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "companies" ("company_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "role_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "user_roles" ("role_id") ON DELETE CASCADE,
    "user_id" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "users" ("user_id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "aerich" (
    "id" SERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "version" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "app" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
